Title: Chinmoku no Kantai
Description: ['During the cold war, the Japan Maritime Self-Defense Force jointly developed a nuclear submarine with the United States Navy. On its maiden voyage, the captain of the submarine declares the submarine to be an independent state, "Yamato."']
Characters: ['Gorou, Watase', 'Hiroshima', 'Mizoguchi', 'Tadokoro, Shin', 'Hayami, Kenji', 'Takegami, Toshio', 'Kaeda, Shirou', 'Kaibara, Wataru', 'Ryan', 'Bennett']
Voices: ['Shioya, Yoku', 'Ootsuka, Akio', 'Naka, Hiroshi', 'Ogata, Kenichi', 'Tobita, Nobuo', 'Saka, Osamu', 'Tsukayama, Masane', 'Wakamoto, Norio', 'Tokumaru, Kan', 'Ueda, Toshiya']
